faq.text: 🍿 | Hey, our bot is quite large and there is a lot of information. Here are a couple of categories for you, choose what information you want to get >
faq.general:
🎈 *Rarity*
Events and dinosaurs are divided into rarities.
The greater the rarity, the sweeter the reward.

 1. Regular - 50%
 2. Unusual - 25%
 3. Rare - 15%
 4. Mystical - 9%
 5. Legendary - 1%

🕹 *Interaction*
To interact with the dinosaur, go to `🕹 Actions`.

 1. In order to feed the dinosaur, you need to get food, click on `🕹 Actions` > `🍕 Gathering food` and follow the instructions.

 2. To feed the dinosaur, press `🕹 Actions` > `🍣 Feed` and select the appropriate food.

 3. In `🎮 Entertainment`, you can choose a game and entertain the dinosaur to cheer it up.

 4. In `🎑 Journey` you can find different items, meet friends and see a lot of interesting things!

 5. `🌙 Put to bed` the dinosaur needs sleep every day, don't forget to put it to sleep!

🎮 *Profile*
 To view inventory or see your stats, go to `👁‍🗨 Profile`

🔧 *Settings*
In the settings, you can rename the dinosaur, disable notifications, or switch the language.

🛒 *Market*
In the market, you can sell or buy the things you need.

👥 *Friends*
In the friends menu, you can manage your friends and referral system. The more friends, the more opportunities to get some bonuses. Also, by inviting a friend through the referral system, you and your friend will receive pleasant bonuses.

🦕 *Number of dinosaurs*
Every 20th level, the number of dinosaurs increases by 1.
20th level - 2 dinosaurs.
 40th level - 3 dinosaurs...
faq.eat:
🥙 *What does my dinosaur eat?* 
 Look at the profile of your dinosaur, dinosaurs live in their native environment. 
 
 Herbivores where there are a lot of grasses, predators in forests / jungles, and those who love fish fly in the clouds. 
 
 🍕 *Sweets* 
 🍯 A jar of honey, 🥞 Sweet pancakes - dinosaurs love sweets and regardless of their species, they will gladly eat them! 
 
 Also, this food gives bonuses to mood / health, etc. 
 
 You can find out all the information about the item in the inventory!
faq.accessories:
🏓 *Accessories* 
 Accessories open up additional opportunities or speed up the type of activity. 
 Accessories can be installed while the dinosaur is doing nothing by using it in the inventory. 
 Accessories can be found in travels or dungeons. 
 
 🎲 *Here are some of them...* 
 🧸 Teddy bear - allows you to select a sleep mode. 
 🛠 Tools - speed up the collection of food.
faq.dungeon:
📜 *Quests* 
 
 In the tavern you can get a quest (just wait in it), quests give interesting bonuses for the most common actions! 
 
 🗻 *Dungeons* 
 Embark on an exciting adventure with your friends! Adventures, bosses, unique items! 
 To get into the dungeon you only need 200 coins! 
 You don't need any initial equipment, and your dinosaurs can't die in it. 
 
 🍺 *Dino Tavern* 
 Take a look at `‍🍺 Dino Tavern`, There you can find information from visitors, find other players. And also get quests!

tavern_dialogs: They say terrible monsters roam the dungeons ...
My dinosaur can overwhelm 20 of these!
Don't tell me, ha ha ha!
They say the items in the high-end dungeon...
Yesterday I walked, I got some kind of glowing stone ...
Have you seen what a terrible face this goblin has?!
Yes, I eat these for breakfast!
How do they fight with these blunt swords?
I'm not going back there!
Are you afraid to go down into the dungeon?!
My friend Bari went there 21 years ago, I'm still waiting...
Yesterday I saw the Hero coming out of the dungeon with a golden sword!
Don't tell fairy tales, there's no one scary there!
Tell us how you lost your eye in this dungeon...
Yes, I'm not afraid! It's just that there are no coins to enter ...
What time will it be, the 21st? And how much have you learned from there already?
Yes ...
Yes, no...
Kidding?
AHA HA HA!
Ho ho ho ...
Are you running into trouble?!
Drink?!
Good news, pour!
Piggy Piggy
Demon....
They say there are many treasures hidden in the dungeons ...
My dinosaur can cut any monster into pieces!
It is said that ancient evil spirits live in the dungeons...
I found 2 gold coins in the dungeon!
I heard that in the dungeon you can find a secret passage to the treasure ...
A real hero on two legs, and my dinosaur is a hero on four!
It is said that ancient relics can only be found in dungeons...
My dinosaur is so fast that it runs around any monster!
The dungeon is cool, the perfect place for an adventure on a hot summer day...
I know where several treasure chests are hidden!
Hey, I told you my dinosaur was cooler!
It's always a good idea to be on a team with a strong dinosaur...
Victory over the monster is exclusively in the hands of precious swords!
I have a map that leads directly to the wealth in the dungeon...
The winner will get all the opportunities!
I just defeated a monster. It was so easy!

My dinosaur is a real predator!!
I feel like a real hero!
It was the easiest battle of all time!

I read the manual - the dungeon is full of fruitful places!
The monsters in the dungeon are already shaking our names!

Do not feed other people's monsters - win!

This ladron steals my liquids and useful stuff, doesn't it?!
I know where the monsters are hiding, but I won't tell you...
Cut, block and dodge! These are the most important rules in the manual!
The dungeon is filled with mysterious knowledge...
Maybe he's looking after us with this toy, but I'm ready for it!

Look at my dinosaur, he's a real beast!

I know all the dungeons, and my dinosaur is the best of the best!
I don't get tired of fighting in this dungeon!

I can't believe I actually found this magic sword!
We successfully took possession of this treasure - it was so easy!
Our team has unique abilities and technologies to win!
My dinosaur won't be left idle when it comes to winning!
What a superb battle!!

Our dinosaur is the best team and nothing will stop us!
We will win this battle because we are a team of like-minded people!
This monster will never know that the winners are waiting for him!
Maybe winning is just me, but my dinosaur isn't going to give in to anyone.

Fighting in this dungeon is what we're here for.

tavern_enter: At the entrance to the tavern, you feel a pleasant coolness and hear the sounds of creaking wooden furniture, the aroma of food and drinks then makes you escape from hunger.
Returning to the tavern, you see many tables drenched in beer and freshly squeezed juices, as well as a crowded society that is loud and cheerful after a long day.
At the entrance, you are greeted by the bright lights and soulful atmosphere surrounding this place, crowded with tourists and locals, warmly welcoming each new guest.
Walking inside, you see a huge bar full of various drinks and a noisy crowd cramming every corner of the tavern, which is teeming with life and tempting food.
Looking around, you notice a dark interior soaked in alcohol and smoking products, and a group of musicians playing on stage in the center of the hall reminds you of life on the road.

You enter a tiny tavern dotted with wooden barrels lining the walls and floor tanks supporting the underground tank, while a bartender standing on the counter with a smile on his face prepares your favorite cocktail.

The surroundings of the tavern are immersed in dimensional calm, when you get inside, you notice a tranquility conducive to a relaxed holiday, and the walls are covered with an old picture and inscriptions extracted by guests, which creates a warm mood.

Entering the huge tavern, you will find several cozy areas where you can spend time with family and friends, the upper floor surprises with a unique dynamic lighting system, it makes the hall sing and dance peacefully pouring into the unique roof of the building.

On this calm evening, full of the fragrance of delicious homemade food, you snap the door of the main hall of the tavern and a calm spiritual corner opens for you in the middle of a foggy tower, which fascinates with its depth and mystery.
Entering a small tavern, you see a cozy and attractive potion, where alternative music and fast food flavors play, creating a real carefree leisure.
When you cross the threshold of the tavern, you feel the warm magic and meet the wide bar counter, where happy guests are already watching what is happening.
Entering the tavern, you will immediately feel the atmosphere of friendliness, relaxation and enjoyment of the royal cuisine.
You smile wryly and sit down at a long table filled with food and drinks, where there is a large screen on which games are shown.
Once inside, you immediately realize that it represents everything you'd expect from a tavern, where loud conversations, live music, and plentiful food rightfully come first.
Embraced by the smells of a gourmet festive dinner, you look at juicy steaks and bottles of expensive wine, where shining glasses and soles make guests relax and enjoy the evening.
Inside the tavern, you will see a mounted bar counter, lively guests and fiery factories working, making the atmosphere even more fiery.

Throwing open the door of the tavern, look at the faces of the smiling bartenders with three liters of cups, immediately creating a peaceful and soulful corner for relaxing and exercising for the whole week.
Surrounded by dark plasters, you can smell freshly baked bread and spices as the aromas fly into the nostrils of guests, creating a pleasant atmosphere.
Everything in the tavern, where live music is played, is imbued with the national flavor and liveliness of the locals, who offer a variety of drinks and snacks on the go.
Entering the hall, where the most interesting things happen, you find a comfortable place on the sofa, the music makes you sing and dance, generous with the mood for the guests.
With working lamps and soft noise, the tavern attracts with its romance and deep aroma of food, and the regulars are always ready to receive a new guest.
On the cozy chairs inside, the quiet notes of the guitar resonate, creating comfort for those who want to sit in a cozy atmosphere after a hard day.
As soon as you enter the beautifully decorated hall, you will feel a warm welcome, in addition to the fragrant kitchen area with rich national dishes.

Under the ringing of cups and the refined color of bright canvases, the guests of the tavern are here to relax and get aesthetic pleasure from the praiseworthy curves of dancing, the smells of food and drinks.
Shrouded in fog and cloudiness, the tavern attracts with its cozy and soulful atmosphere, as well as with its addition of aesthetic nostalgia.
With the creak of wooden furniture and valuable items mounted on curved walls, you feel warm and cozy.
A pleasant atmosphere of friendliness and abundance lies in every corner of this tavern, where music plays and the hospitality of friendly bartenders will not leave you indifferent.
In a foggy hall decorated with confetti and green lanterns, guests relax in various areas, smoke hookahs and experience different national foods.
The aromas of hard liquor, as well as hot fried food, reliably remind you of life in the key of carefree pleasure that is inherent in this tavern.
Opening the door of this tavern, the cozy atmosphere buys you warmth, lightness and optimistic comfort, providing relaxation and entertainment for guests.

Having connected with the sensations from the best days of your childhood, you are immediately rooted between pelicans, down jackets and join the cheerful lads who frown at life, smoke, socialize and drink in the tavern company.
Relaxing, you feel the tranquility and brightness inside this tavern, where loud music, longing, hot food, as well as drinks, are in the first place.
Upon entering the tavern, you are surrounded by plentiful and hospitality, in which guests enjoy fried food, good music and a cheerful mood.
Entering the lamp-lit tavern, you will find a lively crowd screaming loudly and banging bottles in gratitude to the hospitable bartenders and good cuisine.

start.text: ✉ You receive a message from an unknown source.

m1.text: Greetings, dear {user_name}. We have received a message about the extermination of dinosaurs, do you confirm this information?

m2-n.answer: No, I don't know anything about that.

m2-y.text: Nice, give me your reputation ticket

m3-y.answer: Here.. You are welcome... I'm really sorry ...

m2-n.text: Yes? According to our data, this is exactly the case.

m3-n.answer: This is probably my twin brother ...

m3-n.text: {people_name} He looks at you with a smile. Everything is already clear, he knows that you are lying.

m4-n.answer: Yes, yes, yes! My brother is a disgusting person!

m3-y.text: According to your reputation, we have a suggestion for you. Here's a look at the contract.

m4-n.text: I see you don't want to do it for good... I like it, the daring ones are needed in our business, here, sign.

m4-y.text: 📃 After reading the contract, you find out that you give 80% of your savings and all the inventory of the organization, and in return, the organization allocates you an egg of indefinite rarity.

end-y.answer: I like it, I sign it.

m5-n.text: 📃 After reading the contract, you found out that you give 70% of your savings and all the inventory of the organization, and in return, the organization allocates you an egg of uncertain rarity.

end-n.answer: I like it, I sign it.

end-y.text: Great, nice to do business with you)

end-n.text: Great, nice to do business with you)

en.journey_complexity:
*🖼 | About the complexity of the journey*

*🟢 It's easy* - No risk and dangerous collisions, suitable for beginners. Events affect only the mood, the dinosaur will not be harmed.

*🟡 Middling* - In such locations, dangerous situations can occur, but more are still neutral.

*🔴 Difficult* - There are many more dangerous events than neutral ones, you have to go here prepared.

_The greater the risk, the greater the reward_

book_forest:
An ancient and mighty forest with giant trees, so they say about this forest ... 
 I, Fredrick Al Johnson, will check it out for myself!
26.08.3--7 15:38: I just went into the forest, it looks like just a forest, except for huge trees!

26.08.3--7 19:12: I saw a beautiful sunset, went to look for a place to rest. 
 
 8/26/2--7 9:01 PM: I didn't see any dangerous animals all day, just trees, trees, trees.

27.08.3--7 13:59: Crossed a turbulent river, almost lost all his belongings. 
 
 8/27/3--7: I've lost my watch somewhere, now I can't write time, but it's getting dark. 
 
 8/27/3--7: I see light in the distance, I'll try to get closer.
8/27/3--7: I can't believe my eyes, is that... Dinosaurs?! Am I sure I'm not crazy?
I write quickly, one of them felt me, I wind up.

28.08 +- 2 days: I don't know how long I've been sitting here, someone is constantly walking over me, I haven't replenished my water and food supplies for a long time, soon I'll have to replenish it. I'm not sure I can resist DINOSAURS (YES, THAT'S EXACTLY THEM!)
I'll leave it lying here, I hope I'll come back here.
book_lost-islands: It's me Aoth again. Today Propane told me about the ancient ruins on the island and we go there.

When we went ashore, it got hot and we swam. 
 
 After that, walking along the shore, we noticed the ruins of an old temple among the palm trees. 
 
 Going inside, we were amazed by the grandeur of the ancient structure. There were columns everywhere, bas-reliefs were hollowed out in the walls.

After examining the temple, we found 300 coins! 
 
 Propane suddenly tripped over something and sprawled on the ground. I took a look at it. It turned out to be a book. 
 
 A little later we explored several more temples, found a cake and 3 mushrooms.

We fell asleep on the sand. 
 
 And in the morning we returned home.
book_desert: Who doesn't know about the mysterious pyramids, sand dunes and poisonous snakes?

This short story on my behalf is about why it is worth it, and sometimes it is not necessary to go to the desert where dinosaurs roam. 
 
 So let's get started. 
 
 Stocking up on food, I set out to explore the desert. 
 
 The first day was perfect... except that the sun was beating down mercilessly.

I found 50 square coins, where do they come from? 
 
 The next day I reached the pyramid. And I'm not the only one on the campaign.
 
 A huge dinosaur was standing about 20 meters away from me. He pushed the wall and entered the interior, I waited about 5 minutes, and then also entered. The pyramid was huge, riddled with labyrinths and passages.

I will not fully describe the pyramid, because it will take a very long time. 
 
 I can only say that I found parchment with the image of a backpack and strange symbols. 
 
 I fell asleep right in the pyramid.
The next morning, I woke up feeling like someone was looking at me. I open my eyes and see... DINOSAUR! He stood right in front of me and looked at me with his head slightly tilted.

And then the dinosaur spoke. He said to me, "Hello!" 
 "Hello," I replied.
 -My name is Propane, how are you? 
 -Aot. 
 - Let's be friends? 
 -Come on. 
 "Only I'm going to call you a messenger of darkness, because I don't know how you got here."
That's how I made friends with the dinosaur.
book_mountains: Hi, it's me Aot again. Today Propane and I will go on a trip to the mountains.

The Crystal Mountains... How beautiful it is... And it's cold. Br-r-r. 
 
 Walking through the snow, Propane suddenly fell into a snowdrift. I crawled out. And it failed again. Then he counted the coins, took out a square one and threw it into the snow. 
 
 An hour later, it snowed and the dinosaur was upset.

As we sat around the fire, a polar bear approached us. Propane hit him in the side with his hind paw. The bear flew off a couple of meters, but still managed to hook the dinosaur. 
 
 The next day we found an egg. It shimmered. Here it is white. And now it's green. And in a moment it is blue. Now lilac. Orange. And white again. 
 
 We continued on our way. 
 
 Propane bent down and picked up a sheet of parchment. 
 
 This is a cake recipe," he explained, "I love cakes. 
 
 And suddenly there was a blizzard. 
 
 We found ourselves in a forest of strange trees, and between the trunks we could see our house. 
 
 We reached it and sat down to drink tea.

edit_dino.info:
🧬 | *Dinosaur change* 
 _A dinosaur can be transformed into another. With the help of the latest technology, it is possible to change the appearance and genes of a dinosaur!_
 
 🎍 | There are 3 ways to transform:
 
 *🎭 Rarity* - Only the rarity of the dinosaur will change. 
 
 *🎠 Appearance* - Change the appearance. The rarity will remain the same, but the appearance will change in accordance with the rarity of the dinosaur. 
 
 *🎑 Full* - Change and appearance and rarity of the dinosaur. 
 
 _As a result of mutations, your dinosaur's tastes may change._

string_to_str.info:
⚽ In some commands, it is convenient to indicate the time not in numbers, but in text, here is a memo.

If you were sent here, then you can use time text input methods. You can try it right here, write down `/string_to_sec` `1d` `1h` `12m`
You will receive in response 90720 - this is the number of seconds that are calculated from your message.

What symbols can I use?
`w` - Week, `d` - day, `h` - hour, `m` - minute, `s` - second (you can omit the letter)

_By the way, you can specify 1 and the same sign as many times as you like and in any order._

promo.time_end: 🎠 Enter the end time, 0 is infinite. `/string_to_sec` - Do not forget about the memo.
